name: Intelligent IT
tag_list: startups, tech, hot, helpdesk, project-management, engineers, security, video, advertizing
overview:
Intelligent iT is a New York-based Technology company focused on servicing startups and emerging markets. Established in 2002 as Nodesphere, intelligent IT recently rebranded to focus their culture around the startups they increasingly served.

Intelligent iT offers fast and efficient service focused on best practices for long-range goals. These services include helpdesk, short and long term placements, onsite and offsite engineers and technology experts in cloud, systems and security. They are headquartered in midtown NYC and have satellite offices throughout the US.

“We leverage the best of both worlds, the experience and efficiency of a consultancy and the assurance of a proven process and methodology. This is why we openly engage partners that are committed to add extreme value and present our solutions with 100 present transparency” says General Manager Manuel Ruiz.

Web http://intelligentitnyc.com Email info@intelligentitnyc.com Contact Info Manuel Ruiz 500 5th Avenue, Suite 940 New York, New York 10110
